title: Integrating loop-mediated isothermal amplification with lateral flow assay to achieve a highly sensitive method for detecting Streptococcus suis Genome in raw pork
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Eakkapote Prompunt, Weeraya Thongkum, Thitima Sumphanapai, Parin Kamseng, Somphot Saoin, Chirapat Kloypan, Chatchai Tayapiwatana, Sawitree Nangola
